alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 29 at 7:37PM CDT until October 29 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Leakesville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State Line, Buckatunna and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
